# Software Development Lifecycle
        
        ## Planning Phase
        - Requirements gathering
        - Feasibility analysis
        - Resource planning
        
        ## Design Phase
        - System architecture
        - Database design
        - UI/UX design
        
        ## Development Phase
        - Coding standards
        - Version control
        - Code review process
        
        ## Testing Phase
        - Unit testing
        - Integration testing
        - User accep

blueprint_result.name: Software Development Lifecycle (SDLC)
blueprint_result.description: A comprehensive overview of the Software Development Lifecycle, covering key phases and activities.
learning_objectives: Identify key activities in each phase.
Explain the importance of planning and testing.
